subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Jose Canseco went to a Tijuana pharmacy looking for something to boost his testosterone level — low after years of admitted steroid use — and got in trouble again. Limping slightly and saying he was tired, depressed and nearly bankrupt, Canseco pleaded guilty in San Diego to a misdemeanor offense of trying to bring a fertility drug across from Mexico. He was sentenced to 12 months of unsupervised probation.
